00013 using boost::any;
00014 using std::string;
00015 using std::tr1::shared_ptr;
00016 using std::tr1::unordered_map;
00017 
00018 namespace TenUI{
00019         
00020         class StyleSetDeclaration;
00021         
00022         class StyleSet {
00023         public:
00024                 StyleSet(const shared_ptr<StyleSetDeclaration>& _declaration, 
00025                                  const shared_ptr< unordered_map<string, shared_ptr<Style> > >& _styleMap)
00026                         :declaration(_declaration),
00027                          styleMap(_styleMap){}
00028                 virtual ~StyleSet(){}
00029                 
00030                 shared_ptr<Style>       getStyle(const string& styleName){
00031                         return (*styleMap)[styleName];
00032                 }
00033                 any getValue(const string& styleName){
00034                         unordered_map< string, shared_ptr<Style> >::iterator it = styleMap->find(styleName);
00035                         if(it != styleMap->end()){
00036                                 return it->second->getValue();
00037                         }
00038                         return any();
00039                 }
00040                 void setValue(const string& styleName, const any& newValue){
00041                         unordered_map< string, shared_ptr<Style> >::iterator it = styleMap->find(styleName);
00042                         if(it != styleMap->end()){
00043                                 it->second->setValue(newValue);
00044                         }
00045                 }
00046                 
00047                 string getName();
00048                         
00049         private: 
00050                 shared_ptr<StyleSetDeclaration> declaration;
00051                 shared_ptr< unordered_map<string, shared_ptr<Style> > > styleMap;
00052         };
00053         
00054 }
